verses.verse: Ask <WH7592> ye of the LORD <WH4480> <WH3068> rain <WH4306> in the time <WH6256> of the latter rain; <WH4456> so the LORD <WH3068> shall make <WH6213> bright clouds, <WH2385> and give <WH5414> them showers <WH1653> of rain, <WH4306> to every one <WH376> grass <WH6212> in the field. <WH7704>

For <WH3588> the idols <WH8655> have spoken <WH1696> vanity, <WH205> and the diviners <WH7080> have seen <WH2372> a lie, <WH8267> and have told <WH1696> false <WH7723> dreams; <WH2472> they comfort <WH5162> in vain: <WH1892> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they went their way <WH5265> as <WH3644> a flock, <WH6629> they were troubled, <WH6031> because <WH3588> there was no <WH369> shepherd. <WH7462>

Mine anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> against <WH5921> the shepherds, <WH7462> and I punished <WH6485> <WH5921> the goats: <WH6260> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath visited <WH6485> <WH853> his flock <WH5739> <WH853> the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> and hath made <WH7760> them as his goodly <WH1935> horse <WH5483> in the battle. <WH4421>

Out of <WH4480> him came forth <WH3318> the corner, <WH6438> out of <WH4480> him the nail, <WH3489> out of <WH4480> him the battle <WH4421> bow, <WH7198> out of <WH4480> him every <WH3605> oppressor <WH5065> together. <WH3162>

And they shall be <WH1961> as mighty <WH1368> men, which tread down <WH947> their enemies in the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351> in the battle: <WH4421> and they shall fight, <WH3898> because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> is with <WH5973> them, and the riders <WH7392> on horses <WH5483> shall be confounded. <WH954>

And I will strengthen <WH1396> <WH853> the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> and I will save <WH3467> the house <WH1004> of Joseph, <WH3130> and I will bring them again <WH7725> to place them; for <WH3588> I have mercy upon <WH7355> them: and they shall be <WH1961> as though <WH834> I had not <WH3808> cast them off: <WH2186> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> their God, <WH430> and will hear <WH6030> them.

And they of Ephraim <WH669> shall be <WH1961> like a mighty <WH1368> man, and their heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH8055> as through <WH3644> wine: <WH3196> yea, their children <WH1121> shall see <WH7200> it, and be glad; <WH8055> their heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH1523> in the LORD. <WH3068>
I will hiss <WH8319> for them, and gather <WH6908> them; for <WH3588> I have redeemed <WH6299> them: and they shall increase <WH7235> as <WH3644> they have increased. <WH7235>

And I will sow <WH2232> them among the people: <WH5971> and they shall remember <WH2142> me in far countries; <WH4801> and they shall live <WH2421> with <WH854> their children, <WH1121> and turn again. <WH7725>

I will bring them again <WH7725> also out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and gather <WH6908> them out of Assyria; <WH4480> <WH804> and I will bring <WH935> them into <WH413> the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> and Lebanon; <WH3844> and place shall not <WH3808> be found <WH4672> for them.

And he shall pass <WH5674> through the sea <WH3220> with affliction, <WH6869> and shall smite <WH5221> the waves <WH1530> in the sea, <WH3220> and all <WH3605> the deeps <WH4688> of the river <WH2975> shall dry up: <WH3001> and the pride <WH1347> of Assyria <WH804> shall be brought down, <WH3381> and the scepter <WH7626> of Egypt <WH4714> shall depart away. <WH5493>
And I will strengthen <WH1396> them in the LORD; <WH3068> and they shall walk up and down <WH1980> in his name, <WH8034> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>
